Class ActionCard

public class ActionCard extends Card
Represents an action card in an Uno game (Skip, Reverse, Draw Two). Author: Andrew Nell Student ID: 110450836 Email ID: NELAY007 AI Tools Used: None This is my own work as defined by the University's Academic Integrity Policy.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionCard

      public ActionCard(Color color, Value value)
      Constructs an COMP2033_Project_1_110450836.ActionCard with the specified color and value. COMP2033_Project_1_110450836.ActionCard represents specific action cards in Uno, including SKIP, REVERSE, and DRAW_TWO.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the action card; must not be WILD
      value - the value of the action card; must be one of SKIP, REVERSE, or DRAW_TWO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is not SKIP, REVERSE, or DRAW_TWO
      IllegalArgumentException - if the color is WILD
